recipe short summary: A simple and heart warking Italian pizze. Home away from home.

recipe preparation.1: Mix flavour and water and let it rest for 30 minutes
recipe preparation.2: Mix passata, salt, pepper, olive oil, rosemary and let it brew for 30 minutes
recipe preparation.3: Warm up the oven for 220 degrees
recipe preparation.4: Flatten the dough and spread the sauce on it
recipe preparation.5: Add procutto, mozarella and olive oil
recipe preparation.6: Put in the oven for 30 minutes
